content.text: Ukuqonda Iziguquko
Iziguquko zisetshenziselwa ukugcina ulwazi olungasetshenziswa futhi luguqulwe uhlelo lwakho. Cabanga ngazo njengamabhokisi anamalebula agcina amanani.
Amabhlogo Weziguquko Angadonswa

blocks.name: x
blocks.description: Donsa le nguquko endaweni yokuphrinta ukuze ubone inani layo.

blocks.name: y
blocks.description: Donsa le nguquko ebhulokini lomsebenzi ukuze wenze izibalo.

blocks.name: message
blocks.description: Unguquko lwombhalo ongadonswa ukuze ubonise umbhalo.

content.text: Zama ukudonsa amabhlogo weziguquko endaweni ebekwe yona ukuze ubone amanani awo esebenza. Lokhu kusiza ukubona ukuthi iziguquko zigcina futhi zivuselela kanjani ulwazi.
Imithetho Yeziguquko

items: Amagama weziguquko kufanele achaze kahle (isb., score, userName).
Amagama weziguquko abucayi kumacala (x no X ahlukile).
Ungashintsha inani eligcinwe enguqukweni noma yinini.

content.text: Donsa amabhlogo weziguquko ebhasikethini ukuze ubone ukuthi ukunikezela amanani kuziguquko kwandisa kanjani inani. Lokhu kusiza ukubona ukunikezelwa kweziguquko ekuprogrameni.
Ukuqonda Izinhlobo Zedatha
Izinhlobo zedatha zichaza uhlobo lwenani olungagcinwa ngu-nguquko. Izinhlobo ezijwayelekile zihlanganisa izinombolo, amanani anezindawo zokuhlukanisa, imibhalo, nezinguquko eziyi-Boolean.

items: Float/Double: izinombolo ezinezinombolo eziyimihlaba ezifana no-3.14, -0.5
Umbhalo: amanani wombhalo afana no-'Sawubona' noma '123'

content.text:
age = 25
price = 9.99
name = 'Alice'
isStudent = true
Ama-Loops Ekuprogrameni
Ama-loops akuvumela ukuphinda ibhulokhi yekhodi izikhathi eziningi ngaphandle kokuyibhala kabusha.

items: While loops: phinda inqobo nje uma isimo siyiqiniso
Do-while loops: sebenzisa okungenani kanye ngaphambi kokuhlola isimo

content.text: Imisebenzi
Imisebenzi yizigaba zekhowudi ezingasetshenziswa futhi ezenza umsebenzi othile. Ungabiza umsebenzi izikhathi eziningi ngezindlela ezahlukene.

def greet(name):
    print('Sawubona ' + name)

greet('Alice')
greet('Bob')
Imisebenzi isiza ukuhlela ikhodi yakho nokunciphisa ukuphindwa kwayo.
Izitatimende Zezimo
Izimo zivumela uhlelo lwakho ukuthatha izinqumo ngokuya ngezimo ezithile.

items: if: sebenzisa ikhodi uma isimo siyiqiniso
else: sebenzisa ikhodi uma isimo singeyona iqiniso
elif / else if: hlola izimo eziningi

content.text: Ama-Arrays nama-Lists
Ama-arrays (noma ama-lists) asetshenziselwa ukugcina amanani amaningi ku-nguquko eyodwa.

items: Ungagcina izinombolo, imibhalo, noma ngisho nezinye arrays ngaphakathi ku-list.
Ama-lists angahlolwa, aguqulwe, futhi aphinde adluliswe.
